patch.description: Update an instance of 'FormattedSearches' with the given payload of type 'FormattedSearche' in JSON format and with the specified id.

get.description: Retrieve all or some selected properties from an instance of 'FormattedSearches' with the given id.

delete.description: Delete an instance of 'FormattedSearches' with the specified id.

post.description: Create an instance of 'FormattedSearches' with the given payload of type 'FormattedSearche' in JSON format.

get.description: Retrieve a collection of 'FormattedSearches' with all or some selected properties in the given order by specifying the given filter condition.

info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.
info.title: Swagger For Service Layer

tags.name: FormattedSearches
tags.description: This entity enables you to manipulate 'FormattedSearches'. It allows to assign a formatted search function to a specified field, so that SAP Business One users can enter values, originated by a pre-defined search process, to the field.
